revised_title: Experimental Confirmation of Anomalous Sound Propagation and Mode Degeneracy in Noble Gas Mixtures
tldr: The authors conducted experiments on helium-xenon gas mixtures to study anomalous sound propagation and mode degeneracy. They confirmed the prediction of anomalous dispersion and provided evidence for mode degeneracy in disparate mass gas mixtures, which occurs when the acoustic mode becomes degenerate with another longitudinal hydrodynamic mode at critical values of frequency and composition.
